entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. 30 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning. Fog patches developing in the morning. Amount 20 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Clearing after midnight. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023
